answer: Taxis aren't run by the government everywhere. For example here in the Czech Republic the government recognizes two types taxi and yellow taxi the main difference being that yellow ones can use taxi stands and special lanes but both are private cars by your definition. It is not possible to answer the question in a way that applies globally because there are different conditions in different countries.
